svg.title: Setting drag image during drag and drop of SVG link
svg.textArea: Try to drag circle. Drag feedback should look like green rectangle.
svg.script: var a = document.querySelector('a'), rect = document.querySelector('rect'); a.addEventListener('dragstart', function (event) {event.dataTransfer.effectAllowed = 'copy'; event.dataTransfer.setDragImage(document.querySelector('rect'), 50, 50);} ,false);
